lead_paragraph: Though the vote is only a first step toward Congressional approval, supporters view it as a significant step toward normalization of the relationship between the countries.
snippet: Though the vote is only a first step toward Congressional approval, supporters view it as a significant step toward normalization of the relationship between the countries.

headline.main: House Panel Votes to Ease Cuba Travel Restrictions
headline.print_headline: House Panel Votes to Ease Cuba Travel Restrictions
